name: I Have a god complex!
description:
A small and simple god game, drop the globe onto the mushroom to start a new world and use the rain cloud to make sure the world is hydrated and happy don't water too much however or your world can become flooded and don't lag too much on the moisture or your world will be a desolate wasteland and die out don't fret you can always start a new one.

submitted for Vr jam 2021 this is my first project ever and am looking forward to feedback, enojy!
